entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
